desc: Visual Brainstorm is a program I made in C++ using the Qt Framework. I don't expect to use C++ much as a Web Developer but I'm proud of this and I want to communicate that I've been studying programming for some time now. Visual Brainstorm is a good project that displays my understanding of Object Oriented programming and my will to build.
I'm always amazed at how colorful Web Development is. This quiz template provides the groundwork for construction of a testing system.
This is another template project which consists of HTML,CSS and utilizes the Bootstrap CSS library. As a developer I like making reusable components which is why I like making templates.
A React project that queries the Random Employee API, when this information is returned it can be sorted by clicking the Name header field.
Workout Tracker that utilizes MongoDb, Node.js, Express Server and Javascript. The user can input workout details and have them graphed.

A collaboration project, I wrote the Javascript for much of the front end aswell as back end code on this. It's basically a Magic the Gathering Social Media website that allows you to post cards with comments. This project utilized Sequelize, on the Node backend and jQuery and handlebars on the front end.
